data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmidt, Gustavo A., Melo-Filho, De (2008): Specimens of Galatheidae (Crustacea: Decapoda) collected by N. Pq. “ Soloncy Moura ” off the Southern Coast of Brazil under the Revizee Program. Zootaxa 1841: 31-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183197
